code¶

class controller.Controller¶
__init__()¶

Initializes object attributes, connects buttons and starts the refreshThread

__module__ = 'controller'¶
add_point()¶

Gets called when the new_point button is clicked

Creates a new Point-Process, starts it and adds it to the points list

Returns:void
paintEvent(event)¶

Gets called with every event that happens on the QWidget

Parameters:event – The event which occured, for example Mouse was hovered/clicked over button, update() was called
Returns:void
remove_point()¶

Gets called when the remove_point button is clicked

Removes the last point from list from the model :return:

staticMetaObject = <PySide.QtCore.QMetaObject object at 0x04D43198>¶
class controller.Point(x, y)¶
__init__(x, y)¶

Randomizes Direction and sets object attributes

Parameters:
  • x – Randomized x position
  • y – Randomizes y position
__module__ = 'controller'¶
run()¶

Adjusts the x and y value in a “infinite loop”. :return:
